subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For the Phillies, it was a week of hurry up and wait as their playoff hopes gradually faded. Philadelphia kept its hopes alive, briefly, by beating the Florida Marlins, 4-3.
snippet: For the Phillies, it was a week of hurry up and wait as their playoff hopes gradually faded. Philadelphia kept its hopes alive, briefly, by beating the Florida Marlins, 4-3.
